Interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IBackplaneDevice
Inherited members: ShowHide
Deprecated: ShowHide
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IBackplaneDevice

  • public interface IBackplaneDevice
    Encapsulates how the Backplane identifies a device. The state includes, among other things, a flag indicating whether the device is enabled for download.
    • Fields
